channel.title: Extensibility on Systology
channel.description: Recent content in Extensibility on Systology

item.title: Beam Trial
item.description: Minimal Apache Beam Hello World in Java/Gradle demonstrating pipeline construction, transforms, and DirectRunner execution for learning Beam’s core model.

item.title: Extensibility & Plugin Architecture
item.description: Guidelines for plugin architectures, stable APIs, cross-language bindings, and safe extension points.

item.title: Grit
item.description: Fromâ€‘scratch Git implementation in Rust focusing on object storage, performance, and plumbing/porcelain command compatibility.

item.title: Photohaul
item.description: Java tool for organizing and migrating large photo collections with deduplication, metadata preservation, and resumable jobs.

item.title: Vidicant
item.description: Cross-platform video/image feature extractor (C++ core, Python bindings) for ML preprocessing focusing on throughput, accuracy, and packaging.

item.title: Web App
item.description: Guiding principles for production-ready web apps (12-factor-inspired): scaling, static/media handling, background work, CI/CD, and observability.
